snippet.title: Golem First Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description: First gameplay trailer for the adventure game Golem by Longbow Games. Follow a young girl and a shape-shifting golem who must navigate the ruins of an ancient tower to solve its challenging puzzles and re-activate its long-dormant machines.
